DOC.brief_summary: If compare eradication rate Helicobacter pylorus divide 4 group : amoxicillin , rabeprazole , clarithromycin ( AOC ) , amoxicillin , rabeprazole , metronidazole ( AOM ) , treat amoxicillin , rabeprazole 5 day , follow clarithromycin , metronidazole , rabeprazole 5 day ( sequential ) , amoxicillin , clarithromycin , metronidazole , rabeprazole ( concomitant ) , eradication rate concomitant group high .
DOC.detailed_description: - Subject : The patient gastritis , gastric ulcer , duodenal ulcer infect Helicobacter pylori - 170 subject per group - Eradication regimens follow : AOC group , treat amoxicillin , rabeprazole , clarithromycin 7 day ; AOM group , treat amoxicillin , rabeprazole , metronidazole 7 day ; sequential group , treat amoxicillin , rabeprazole 5 day , follow clarithromycin , metronidazole , rabeprazole 5 day ; concomitant group , treat amoxicillin , clarithromycin , metronidazole , rabeprazole 7 day
DOC.criteria: patient infected Helicobacter pylorus cancer pregnancy formerly treat eradication
